alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 3:11PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lafayette, Dixie and southeastern Taylor Counties through 400 PM EST... At 311 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 17 miles south of Perry to near Steinhatchee to 14 miles west of Horseshoe Point. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mayo, Cross City, Steinhatchee, Horseshoe Point, Suwannee, Horseshoe Beach, Tennille, Shamrock, Clara, Cross City Airport, Shired Island, Old Town, Jonesboro, Jack Lee Island, Hatch Bend, Salem, San Pedro Junction, Fanning Springs, Cedar Island and Fish Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette
